channel.title: Need 2 BETA Testers to try out my server | Need suggestions!
channel.description:
I'm on the verge of launching my server "HolyNovus" I need a few people to test it, help me with the Economy and such!
if you are interested, add my skype skype = tonebawsjinx

item.title: Need 2 BETA Testers to try out my server | Need suggestions!
item.dc:creator: @Flame3 John
item.description:
@Flame3 wrote:

If you’re looking for people to test your server, then post an advertisement in the Server Advertisements forum and provide a client download link. Alternatively, create a development progress thread and request beta testers there.
Good luck.

Read full topic
item.source: Need 2 BETA Testers to try out my server | Need suggestions!

item.title: Need 2 BETA Testers to try out my server | Need suggestions!
item.dc:creator: @RandQm RandQm
item.description:
@RandQm wrote:

I think this would belong in development teams,
you could also put your server online in beta mode and post it in server advertisements
